sentences.en: a man of honour and good sense
sentences.cn: 品德高尚而有头脑的男人

sentences.en: a state banquet in honour of the visiting President
sentences.cn: 为来访总统举办的国宴

sentences.en: Ellsworth was a martyr to his sense of honour and responsibility.
sentences.cn: 埃尔斯沃思深为自己的荣誉感和责任感所累。

sentences.en: He considered himself unworthy of the honour they had bestowed on him.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己不配得到大家赋予他的荣誉。

sentences.en: He was prepared even to die in order to defend the honour of his family.
sentences.cn: 为了捍卫家族荣誉，他甚至愿意献出生命。

sentences.en: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

sentences.en: Honour thy father and thy mother.
sentences.cn: 要孝敬父母。

sentences.en: I esteem it an honour to attend this meeting.
sentences.cn: 我能参加这次大会,感到十分荣幸.

sentences.en: I impressed on him what a huge honour he was being offered.
sentences.cn: 我让他铭记他当时被授予了多么大的荣誉。

sentences.en: I promise on my honour.
sentences.cn: 我以我的名誉保证。

sentences.en: I'll never do it again, honour bright, I won't.
sentences.cn: 我决不会再做了，以我的名誉担保，不会了。

sentences.en: In a marriage, you need to honour one another.
sentences.cn: 婚姻中双方应该互相尊重。

sentences.en: It has been a great honour your coming to visit me.
sentences.cn: 您来看我,不胜荣幸.

sentences.en: Michael said: "It's an honour to finally work with her."
sentences.cn: 迈克尔说：“终于能同她合作是我的荣幸。”

sentences.en: Over 100 players competed for the honour of representing the county in the National Finals.
sentences.cn: 100多位选手为争取代表郡参加全国总决赛的荣誉进行角逐。

sentences.en: She has confirmed that she will accept the honour of a peerage.
sentences.cn: 她已经证实自己将接受贵族封号.

sentences.en: Such generous actions stamp him as a man of honour.
sentences.cn: 如此慷慨的举动说明他是一位君子.

sentences.en: The Foundation is holding a dinner in honour of something or other.
sentences.cn: 基金会正举办某个纪念宴会。

sentences.en: The silver medallist joined the winner in a lap of honour.
sentences.cn: 银牌和金牌得主一起绕场一周.

sentences.en: The two sides agreed to honour a new ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 双方同意执行新的停火协议。

sentences.en: they are meeting in the final for the fifth time with honours even.
sentences.cn: 他们势均力敌，第五次在决赛中相遇。

sentences.en: they are on their honour as gentlemen not to cheat.
sentences.cn: 他们以绅士的名誉担保不会骗人。

sentences.en: They feel deeply the honour of belonging to the Senate.
sentences.cn: 他们为作为参议院的成员而深感荣幸.

words.tran_cn: 荣誉的；名誉的；道义上的
受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的
荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的
名誉学位；获名誉学位者；名誉团体
尊敬；[金融]承兑；承兑远期票据

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)(常用于形容招待客人食物、饮料）尽地主之谊，做东
为庆祝；向某人表示敬意
[用于表示真 诚]以我的名誉担保
在道德责任下，以名誉担保

trans.tran_cn: 尊敬，正义感，荣誉，荣幸，引起尊敬的人/事物，头衔，优秀成绩/课程，荣誉学位，阁下，最大点数的牌
trans.tran_en: something that makes you feel very proud

trans.tran_cn: 授予…荣誉，尊重，执行（协议）
trans.tran_en: to treat someone with special respect
to show publicly that someone is respected and admired, especially by praising them or giving them a special title
